title: Quiz - Present Simple Questions & Short Answers
description: Quiz sur la formation des questions au présent simple et les réponses courtes

questions.question: Which question is correctly formed?
questions.explanation: With 'you', we use 'Do' + base form of verb: 'Do you speak English?'

questions.question: What's the correct short answer to 'Does she work here?'
questions.explanation: Short answer uses the auxiliary: 'Yes, she does' (not the main verb).

questions.question: How do you ask about someone's parents?
questions.explanation: 'Parents' is plural, so we use 'Do' + base form: 'Do your parents live here?'

questions.question: Complete the question: '_____ time _____ you wake up?'
questions.explanation: Question word + 'do' with 'you': 'What time do you wake up?'

questions.question: What's wrong with 'Does he works in Paris?'
questions.explanation: After 'does', use base form: 'Does he work in Paris?' (not 'works').
